flixel.animation.FlxAnimation

type
class
extends
FlxBaseAnimation
Just a helper structure for the FlxSprite animation system.

Constructor

new(Parent : FlxAnimationController, Name : String, Frames : Array<Int>, ?FrameRate : Int, ?Looped : Bool)
parameters
Name What this animation should be called (e.g. "run")
Frames An array of numbers indicating what frames to play in what order (e.g. 1, 2, 3)
FrameRate The speed in frames per second that the animation should play at (e.g. 40)
Looped Whether or not the animation is looped or just plays once
Constructor

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

curFrame(default,accessor) : Int

metadata
:isVar
Keeps track of the current frame of animation. This is NOT an index into the tile sheet, but the frame number in the animation object.

curIndex(default,accessor) : Int

inherited from flixel.animation.FlxBaseAnimation
Keeps track of the current index into the tile sheet based on animation or rotation. Allow access to private var from FlxAnimationController.

delay(default,null) : Float

Seconds between frames (basically the framerate)

finished : Bool

Whether the current animation has finished.

frameRate(default,accessor) : Int

Animation frameRate - the speed in frames per second that the animation should play at.

looped : Bool

Whether or not the animation is looped

name : String

inherited from flixel.animation.FlxBaseAnimation
String name of the animation (e.g. "walk")

numFrames(default,null) : Int

Accesor for frames.length

parent : FlxAnimationController

inherited from flixel.animation.FlxBaseAnimation
Animation controller this animation belongs to

paused : Bool

Whether the current animation gets updated or not.
